text: Ne sperechayut聞sya z lyud聞my svyatoho pysannya (Yevreyi, Khrystyyanyn, ta Muslims) krim u naypryyemnishomu mozhlyvomu sposobi - yakshcho ne vony porushuyut聞 - ta kazhut聞, "My virymo v shcho buly vidkryti do nas ta u shcho buly vidkryti do vas, ta nash boh ta vash boh ta toy zhe; yomu my submitters
